message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to us and the market, I propose a starting price of $1400000. This price reflects the high quality and potential return on investment for your company. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations and budget.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your valuation of our product. In light of this, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $1350000. This price still allows us to cover our costs and achieve a reasonable profit, while remaining competitive in the market. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you were considering.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1200000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1300000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am prepared to offer the product at $1325000. This price takes into account both our profit margin and the value you see in the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects our interests while remaining within your budget constraints. I look forward to your response.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1300000. I'm willing to meet you at $1320000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand your position, Bob. After reviewing our costs and potential revenue, I am willing to consider $1315000 as a final offer. This price reflects a balance between our needs and your budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to meet you at $1310000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Considering your latest offer and our ongoing negotiations, I am willing to agree upon a final price of $1312500 for the product. This price ensures a fair profit for us while staying within your budget constraints. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1300000, but no higher. This is my absolute final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider purchasing the product from John for $1500000.
